summary.text:
Family Business Legacy Act of 2018

This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the estate tax, to allow the value of the taxable estate to be determined by deducting from the value of the gross estate the amount of all bequests, devises, or transfers to or for the use of certain tax-exempt organizations. The deduction allowed by this bill for any transfer may not exceed the value of the transferred property required to be included in the gross estate.

bill.title: Family Business Legacy Act of 2018

item.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from the value of taxable estates bequests to certain exempt organizations.

dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
